metadata.title: CVE-2023-3255 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: [VNC: infinite loop in inflate_buffer() leads to denial of service]

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-07-14, the proposed patch has not yet been accepted upstream, marking as deferred

criterions.comment: qemu package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-07-14').
